title: Clothes and Fashion 1
sentences: Today I am wearing a blue t-shirt because it is very hot.
Do you like these black pants or do you prefer the blue ones?
son muy elegantes y parecen cómodos.
Those shoes are very elegant and look comfortable.
antes de salir, que hace frío.
Put on the jacket before going out; it's cold.
rojo para la fiesta de esta noche.
She is wearing a red dress for tonight's party.
es demasiado corta para ir a trabajar.
This skirt is too short to go to work.
I always wear a hat when I go to the beach.
I need to buy socks because mine have holes.
blanca es perfecta para la entrevista.
That white shirt is perfect for the interview.
de lana es muy suave y caliente.
The wool sweater is very soft and warm.
es muy largo y me protege de la nieve.
My coat is very long and protects me from the snow.
Llevo las llaves y el dinero dentro del
I carry the keys and the money inside the bag.
No puedo ver nada sin mis
I can't see anything without my sunglasses when it's sunny.
Este pantalón es muy ancho, necesito un
These pants are very wide; I need a belt.
antes de ir a la cama.
I put on my pajamas before going to bed.
Use the scarf if your throat hurts.
Tengo las manos frías porque olvidé los
My hands are cold because I forgot my gloves.
nuevas para caminar por la montaña.
I'm wearing the new boots to walk through the mountains.
de deporte para ir al gimnasio.
I like using sneakers to go to the gym.
He has to wear a tie to go to the office.
para la boda de tu hermana?
What are you going to put on for your sister's wedding?
Today she is wearing some very beautiful earrings.
Where do you want to buy your new clothes?
I have to try on these jeans before paying for them.
My father puts on his suit only for parties.
dictionary:
La camiseta - The t-shirt
El pantalón / Los pantalones - The pants
El zapato - The shoe
La chaqueta - The jacket
El vestido - The dress
La falda - The skirt
El sombrero - The hat
El calcetín / Los calcetines - The socks
La camisa - The shirt
El jersey - The sweater
El abrigo - The coat
El bolso - The bag
Las gafas de sol - The sunglasses
El cinturón - The belt
El pijama - The pajamas
La bufanda - The scarf
El guante / Los guantes - The gloves
La bota - The boot
La zapatilla - The sneaker
La corbata - The tie
Ponerse - To put on
Llevar - To wear / To carry
Comprar - To buy
Probarse - To try on
El traje - The suit
